item.title: How to install Geppaku theme
item.description: Geppaku is bluish white theme for Hugo. It is color name in Japan. Chinese character is “月白”. 月白（げっぱく）とは、月の光を思わせる薄い青みを含んだ白色のことです。 via http://irocore.com/geppaku/ Geppaku is the white color including a thin blue that reminiscent of the light of the moon. (If that translate is wrong, please inform me using PullRequest.) Screenshot Index page Post page Installation $ mkdir themes $ cd themes $ git clone https://github.com/masa0221/hugo-theme-geppaku hugo-theme-geppaku See the Hugo documentation for more information.

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: Step 1. Install Hugo Goto hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your os and architecture. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step. More complete instructions are available at installing hugo Step 2. Build the Docs Hugo has its own example site which happens to also be the documentation site you are reading right now.
